law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 33, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 367, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 136, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1979. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 21, effective July 1, 1976.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Regulations for operation of public kindergarten -- Attendance eligibility.
metadata.former-history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 363, sec. 18, effective June 30, 1976. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 2.
